In certain areas of the country, in what we have
come to call Rural America, the poor are trapped
in remote communities, with no facilities, sub¬
sisting with only the barest necessities of life.
The•following excerpt from a rural Newsletter,
"The Hawk," prepared weekly by people living in
a remote Kentucky region of Appalachia, describes
the plight of the children of that community.
"True Story," was written by Martha Ann, a nine
year old child.
